nodes.text: The Lawquanes were a family located on the planet Saleucami. The adoptive father of the family was Cut Lawquane, a former clone trooper. He worked as a farmer and had married Suu. The two children of the family were Jek Lawquane and Shaeeah Lawquane.
During the Battle of Saleucami, Cut joined with Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" to defend their home from BX-series droid commandos.
